name: Turbo Cat Fight
description:
Turbo Cat Fight is an Experimental Pixel Perfect Fighting Game. You pick 4 loadouts which total out 20 moves and fight it out with your opponent with your massive arsenals. Challenge your friend to an ultimate showdown of an earthshaking fist trade!

Features

  • Pinnacle minimalistic art (watch out for Stendhal Syndrome!)
  • A total of 85 different skills!
  • No deceptive hitboxes, because this game is pixel-perfect!
  • PREVENTS DEATH when you time LifeCling button to your opponent attacks.
  • Best tutorial ever! If I do say so myself..
  • Music by Visager and Monplaisir, who kindly offered their music free on the internet.
  • Screenshakes?
